sentences.sentence: Dogs nosed around in piles of refuse.
sentences.translation: 一群狗在垃圾堆上嗅来嗅去。

sentences.sentence: Reporters nosed out all the details of the affair.
sentences.translation: 记者们打探出了这件事情的所有细节。

sentences.sentence: He could not see the driver as the car nosed forward.
sentences.translation: 当那辆车缓慢向前行驶时，他看不见司机。
